layout_strategy.spacing: Use 'compact' spacing for tables (p-2, p-3) but 'generous' spacing for page margins (p-6, p-8).

shadcn_overrides.instruction: Reduce cell padding to 'p-3' for high density. Use 'tabular-nums' for data columns.
Remove default shadow. Use 1px border 'border-white/10' and 'bg-zinc-900/50'.
Use 'h-9' (sm) by default for dashboard actions. Primary buttons should be Emerald-500 with black text for contrast.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Ticket Slide-over' using the Sheet component. Do not force users to leave the list view to edit a ticket.
Use Recharts for the analytics dashboard (Ticket Volume Line Chart, Status Pie Chart).
Ensure the 'Priority' field uses the semantic colors defined above.
The sidebar must be collapsible to maximize screen real estate for the data tables.
For the 'My Clients' page, use a Card Grid layout instead of a table for better visual separation.
Login Page: Split layout. Left side: Login form. Right side: The 'login_background' image with a glass overlay.
DO NOT use 'purple' or 'teal' as primary colors. Stick to the Grey/Green/Emerald theme.
Ensure text contrast is accessible on dark backgrounds. Use 'text-zinc-400' for secondary text, not darker.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
